planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.
b. Move toward a bounty target (character, crew, faceup/facedown contact)
action: If bounty slots are full, discard this player's highest-class bounty that does not match a character, crew or faceup contact anywhere in the world.

If not all bounty slots are full, reveal cards from a bounty market deck until a bounty that matches character, crew or faceup contact is revealed. Gain that bounty. Then shuffle the bounty market deck
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Encounter a bounty target in this space (character, crew, faceup contact)
